text:
Do you mean in JuliaFolds/Transducers? I just let `eachslice` handle it. For example, `reduce(+, ...; dims)` is something like

```using Transducers
foldxl(+, Broadcasting(), eachrow(rand(2, 3)))  # sequential
foldxt(+, Broadcasting(), eachrow(rand(2, 3)))  # threaded```
or, alternatively (probably more compiler friendly)

```using BangBang
foldxl(add!!, eachrow(rand(2, 3)))
foldxt(add!!, eachrow(rand(2, 3)))```
